inv_posdef

PURPOSE

INV_POSDEF Invert positive definite matrix.

SYNOPSIS

function x = inv_posdef(A)

DESCRIPTION 

 INV_POSDEF        Invert positive definite matrix.
 INV_POSDEF(A) is like INV(A) but faster and more numerically stable.

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • inv_triu INV_TRIU Invert upper triangular matrix.
This function is called by:
  • dataprobwsig Compute probability P(Wvec|D), where Wvec specifies the edge lengths for
  • gplike Compute log probability of data X (assume 0 mean) under a Gaussian model

0005 U = chol(A);
0006 iU = inv_triu(U);
